com.github.cooperroalson.untitled_thinggy_thingg.core.gamestates

Class UIGameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.cooperroalson.untitled_thinggy_thingg.gameplay.client.ui.UIContainer
      • com.github.cooperroalson.untitled_thinggy_thingg.core.gamestates.UIGameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sprite, GameState, UIComponent

    public class UIGameState
extends UIContainer
implements GameState
    An implementation of GameState that is a UIContainer for a GUI. Has another GameState running in the background, and can use different UIGameState.UIPauseModes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UIGameState.UIPauseMode
      An enum representing the ways a UIGameState can treat its backgroundGameState.

    • Constructor Summary

      • registerActionMap

        public void registerActionMap()
        Registers the Actions associated with this GameState. This should only occur once per class (you should probably use a static boolean field to keep track of this). Also registers the backgroundGameState's action map.
        Specified by:
        registerActionMap in interface GameState
